c74object.name: jit.gl.vvisf
c74object.digest: Render ISF files to GL textures
c74object.description: Use jit.gl.vvisf to render ISF files to GL textures.

outlet.digest: Lists describing the loaded ISF's parameters (INPUTS in the ISF spec)
Lists describing ISF files installed on the system

method.name: float
method.digest: Renders and outputs a frame at the given time in seconds.
method.description: Renders and outputs a frame at the given time in seconds.

method.name: read
method.digest: Reads an ISF file from disk.
method.description: Reads an ISF file. If src-name is a path, the file at the path will be loaded- if it's a name of a globally installed file, the globally installed file will be loaded.

method.name: getparamlist
method.digest: Dumps lists describing the loaded ISF's inputs out the appropriate outlet. The first message output is "clear", which cna be used as a token between dumps.

method.name: getparam
method.description: Returns the properties (min val, max val, default val, current val) of the specified input. Values are returned in a list which is sent out the "inputs" outlet.

method.name: param
method.digest: Sets the value of one of the loaded ISF's INPUTS
method.description: The number and type of args depends on the type of the input- 'long' INPUTS will expect 'long' values, 'float' INPUTS will expect 'float' values, "image" INPUTS will expect jitter matrices/textures.

method.name: all_filenames
method.description: Dump a list describing all of the ISF files already installed on this system.

method.name: source_filenames
method.description: Dump a list describing the ISF files installed on this system that are sources/generators (ie: not filters or transitions).

method.name: filter_filenames
method.description: Dump a list describing the ISF files installed on this system that are image filters (they require an image input to function)

method.name: transition_filenames
method.description: Dump a list describing the ISF files installed on this system that are transitions (they composite two images together)

method.name: all_categories
method.description: Dump a list describing all of the ISF categories used across all installed ISF files.

method.name: category
method.digest: List all ISFs in passed category name.
method.description: Dump a list describing all of the ISF filenames that are in the passed category.

attribute.name: adapt
attribute.digest: If enabled, render size will match input texture size.
attribute.description: If enabled, render size will match input texture size (or last input texture size if rendering was triggered by a bang or time value).

attribute.name: dim
attribute.digest: The size at which this object should render if adapt is 0
attribute.description: The size at which this object should render if adapt is 0
